patthana8.74:4.1: Nasaraṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṃ.
patthana8.74:5.1: Naaraṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naaraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana8.74:6.1: Nasaraṇañca naaraṇañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṃ.
patthana8.74:7.1: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve … pe … vipāke ekaṃ … pe … avigate pañca.
